entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
